description: Returns a paginated list of data providers for your account in the current region.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to the data providers described in the form of key-value pairs. Valid filter names and values: data-provider-identifier, data provider arn or name (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: Specifies the unique pagination token that makes it possible to display the next page of results. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords. If Marker is returned by a previous response, there are more results available. The value of Marker is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, make the call again using the returned token and keeping all other arguments unchanged.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: Specifies the unique pagination token that makes it possible to display the next page of results. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: DataProviders
nested_items.description: A description of data providers.

nested_items.name: DataProviderName
nested_items.description: The name of the data provider.

nested_items.name: DataProviderArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the data provider.

nested_items.name: DataProviderCreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the data provider was created.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the data provider. Descriptions can have up to 31 characters. A description can contain only ASCII letters, digits, and hyphens (-----). Also, it can't end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens, and can only begin with a letter.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The type of database engine for the data provider. Valid values include "aurora", "aurora-postgresql", "mysql", "oracle", "postgres", "sqlserver", redshift, mariadb, mongodb, db2, db2-zos and docdb. A value of "aurora" represents Amazon Aurora MySQL-Compatible Edition.

nested_items.name: RedshiftSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines an Amazon Redshift data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the Amazon Redshift data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the Amazon Redshift data provider.

nested_items.name: PostgreSqlSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines a PostgreSQL data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the PostgreSQL server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the PostgreSQL data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the PostgreSQL data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the PostgreSQL data provider. The default value is none.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: MySqlSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines a MySQL data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the MySQL server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the MySQL data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the MySQL data provider. The default value is none.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: OracleSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines an Oracle data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the Oracle server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the Oracle data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the Oracle data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the Oracle data provider. The default value is none.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: AsmServer
nested_items.description: The address of your Oracle Automatic Storage Management (ASM) server. You can set this value from the asm_server value. You set asm_server as part of the extra connection attribute string to access an Oracle server with Binary Reader that uses ASM. For more information, see Configuration for change data capture (CDC) on an Oracle source database.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerOracleAsmSecretId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the secret in Secrets Manager that contains the Oracle ASM connection details.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerOracleAsmAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that provides access to the secret in Secrets Manager that contains the Oracle ASM connection details.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerSecurityDbEncryptionSecretId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the secret in Secrets Manager that contains the transparent data encryption (TDE) password. DMS requires this password to access Oracle redo logs encrypted by TDE using Binary Reader.

nested_items.name: SecretsManagerSecurityDbEncryptionAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that provides access to the secret in Secrets Manager that contains the TDE password.

nested_items.name: MicrosoftSqlServerSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines a Microsoft SQL Server data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the Microsoft SQL Server server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the Microsoft SQL Server data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the Microsoft SQL Server data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the Microsoft SQL Server data provider. The default value is none.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: DocDbSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines a DocumentDB data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the source DocumentDB server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the DocumentDB data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the DocumentDB data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the DocumentDB data provider. The default value is none.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: MariaDbSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines a MariaDB data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the MariaDB server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the MariaDB data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the MariaDB data provider. The default value is none.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: IbmDb2LuwSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines an IBM DB2 LUW data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the DB2 LUW server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the DB2 LUW data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the DB2 LUW data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the DB2 LUW data provider. The default value is none. Valid Values: none and verify-ca.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: IbmDb2zOsSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines an IBM DB2 for z/OS data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the DB2 for z/OS server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the DB2 for z/OS data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the DB2 for z/OS data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the DB2 for z/OS data provider. The default value is none. Valid Values: none and verify-ca.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: MongoDbSettings
nested_items.description: Provides information that defines a MongoDB data provider.

nested_items.name: ServerName
nested_items.description: The name of the MongoDB server.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port value for the MongoDB data provider.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The database name on the MongoDB data provider.

nested_items.name: SslMode
nested_items.description: The SSL mode used to connect to the MongoDB data provider. The default value is none.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate used for SSL connection.

nested_items.name: AuthType
nested_items.description: The authentication type for the database connection. Valid values are PASSWORD or NO.

nested_items.name: AuthSource
nested_items.description: The MongoDB database name. This setting isn't used when AuthType is set to "no".

nested_items.name: AuthMechanism
nested_items.description: The authentication method for connecting to the data provider. Valid values are DEFAULT, MONGODB_CR, or SCRAM_SHA_1.
